EXPERIENCE.title: InnovaRhyno - Web developer
EXPERIENCE.description: At Innova Rhyno, I've tackled a captivating project utilizing cutting-edge tech like Angular, Google Maps, and Firebase. My contributions improved the project's architecture, user interface, and testing practices. I efficiently resolved user stories and issues, and streamlined services to reduce costs. This technical expertise has demonstrably enhanced development quality, propelling our team and projects forward.

EXPERIENCE.title: Lagoon Studios - Co-founder & Web developer
EXPERIENCE.description: At Lagoon Studios, my personal venture, I have primarily worked with React and React Native, gaining a deep understanding of these technologies and successfully applying their concepts to my primary work projects, significantly enhancing the quality of the products I deliver. Additionally, I have undertaken projects that involved the rapid handling of large datasets with Firebase, and I have leveraged Jest as a testing environment to ensure the reliability and quality of the codebase. Through Lagoon Studios, I have honed my skills and brought innovative solutions to the forefront of my professional endeavors.

PROJECTS.title: TDHFest
PROJECTS.description: This project focused on managing event attendance for over 8,000 participants on two separate occasions. Attendees received a unique QR code via email, which they scanned using a custom mobile app to ensure a smooth and swift entry process at the event.
